provenance: Syracuse 36334, from the Fusco necropolis.

provenance: 2 West Berlin F 3296, from Palazzuolo.

provenance: Palermo 2198 (old no. 3480), from Gela. Rim broken off;
publications: LCS, p. 203, no. 28a, pi. 80,1 (reverse); Suppl. Ill, p. 99, no. 51.
description: [a) Standing draped woman, resting r. arm on pillar, Eros beside seated woman looking into mirror, half-draped youth; bust of silen, above, [b) draped woman with fillet in r. hand, young satyr bending forward with phiale in r. hand.

provenance: Vatican U 21 (inv. 17969).
